card.name: Mystical Elf
card.text: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power

card.name: Feral Imp
card.text: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy

card.name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1
card.text: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue

card.name: Sword of Dark Destruction
card.text: A Dark monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points

card.name: Trap Hole
card.text: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons a monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target
